title: एयर इंडिया क्रैश में 40 पैसेंजर थे कोरोना पॉज़िटिव? कलेक्टर ने इसे बताया ‘फ़ेक न्यूज़’
author: www.altnews.in
vclaim: Kerala CM Pinarayi Vijayan has announced a compensation of Rs 10 lakhs to the next of kin of each passenger who died in the #AirIndiaExpress crash that took place at the Karipur International Airport yesterday: Kerala Chief Minister’s Office (CMO) pic.twitter.com/TQy6vEOjve
